_comment: binding type requires @{propertyName} format for data binding expressions

generatedBy.description: AI generation command that created this component (metadata only, not rendered)

widthWeight.description: Width weight for flexible layouts (binding supported in UIKit)

heightWeight.description: Height weight for flexible layouts (binding supported in UIKit)

maxWidthWeight.description: Maximum width weight (binding supported in UIKit)

maxHeightWeight.description: Maximum height weight (binding supported in UIKit)

minWidthWeight.description: Minimum width weight (binding supported in UIKit)

minHeightWeight.description: Minimum height weight (binding supported in UIKit)

aspectWidth.description: Aspect ratio width (binding supported in UIKit)

aspectHeight.description: Aspect ratio height (binding supported in UIKit)

weight.description: Shorthand for widthWeight (binding supported in UIKit)

background.description: Background color - hex string (#RRGGBB or #RRGGBBAA) or color name from colors.json (can be data binding)

tapBackground.description: Background color when tapped - hex string or color name from colors.json (binding supported)

highlightBackground.description: Background color when highlighted - hex string or color name from colors.json (binding supported)

disabledBackground.description: Background when disabled - hex string or color name from colors.json (binding supported in UIKit)

defaultBackground.description: Default background color - hex string or color name from colors.json (binding supported in UIKit)

borderColor.description: Border color - hex string or color name from colors.json (binding supported)

borderStyle.description: Border line style - solid (default), dashed, or dotted

opacity.description: Opacity (0-1), alias for alpha - can be data binding

visibility.description: View visibility state (can be data binding)

hidden.description: Whether component is hidden (can be data binding)

paddings.description: Padding as single value or [top, right, bottom, left]

padding.description: Padding as single value or [top, right, bottom, left] (alias for paddings)

rightPadding.description: Right padding (alias for paddingRight, binding supported)

leftPadding.description: Left padding (alias for paddingLeft, binding supported)

margins.description: Margin as single value or [top, right, bottom, left]

minTopMargin.description: Minimum top margin (binding supported in UIKit)

minBottomMargin.description: Minimum bottom margin (binding supported in UIKit)

minLeftMargin.description: Minimum left margin (binding supported in UIKit)

minRightMargin.description: Minimum right margin (binding supported in UIKit)

maxTopMargin.description: Maximum top margin (binding supported in UIKit)

maxBottomMargin.description: Maximum bottom margin (binding supported in UIKit)

maxLeftMargin.description: Maximum left margin (binding supported in UIKit)

maxRightMargin.description: Maximum right margin (binding supported in UIKit)

centerInParent.description: Center both horizontally and vertically (binding supported in UIKit)

centerVertical.description: Center vertically in parent (binding supported in UIKit)

centerHorizontal.description: Center horizontally in parent (binding supported in UIKit)

alignTop.description: Align to parent top (binding supported in UIKit)

alignBottom.description: Align to parent bottom (binding supported in UIKit)

alignLeft.description: Align to parent left (binding supported in UIKit)

alignRight.description: Align to parent right (binding supported in UIKit)

alignLeftOfView.description: Align to right of specified view ID

alignRightOfView.description: Align to left of specified view ID

alignTopView.description: Align top edge with specified view

alignBottomView.description: Align bottom edge with specified view

alignLeftView.description: Align left edge with specified view

alignRightView.description: Align right edge with specified view

alignCenterVerticalView.description: Align vertical center with specified view

alignCenterHorizontalView.description: Align horizontal center with specified view

clipToBounds.description: Whether to clip content to bounds (binding supported)

onclick.description: Click handler function name (selector-based, lowercase) - string only, no binding

onLongPress.description: Long press gesture handler (camelCase) - binding only (@{functionName})

tintColor.description: Tint color - hex string or color name from colors.json (binding supported)

include.description: Include another JSON layout (filename without extension)

binding_group.description: Groups related bindings for batch updates (can be array for multiple groups)

tag.description: View tag for identification (binding supported in UIKit)

enabled.description: Whether component is enabled (can be data binding)

onAppear.description: Lifecycle callback when view appears (SwiftUI/Compose only)

onDisappear.description: Lifecycle callback when view disappears (SwiftUI/Compose only)

text.description: Text content (can be data binding, supports interpolation)

font.description: Font name or 'bold' (can be data binding)

fontColor.description: Font color - hex string or color name from colors.json (can be data binding)

lines.description: Maximum number of lines (0 for unlimited) (binding supported in UIKit)

lineHeightMultiple.description: Line height multiplier (binding supported in UIKit)

edgeInset.description: Edge insets as array or pipe-separated string

underline.description: Underline styling (boolean for simple, object for styled)

strikethrough.description: Strikethrough styling (boolean for simple, object for styled)

minimumScaleFactor.description: Minimum scale factor for auto-shrink (binding supported in UIKit)

placeholder.description: Placeholder text when empty (alias for hint)

fontColor.description: Font color - hex string or color name from colors.json

highlightColor.description: Font color when selected - hex string or color name from colors.json (binding supported in UIKit)

hintColor.description: Hint text color - hex string or color name from colors.json (binding supported in UIKit)

secure.description: Secure text entry for passwords (can be data binding)

accessoryBackground.description: Input accessory background - hex string or color name from colors.json

accessoryTextColor.description: Input accessory text color - hex string or color name from colors.json
